# m365filer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

m365filer is intended to be a simple, natural feeling file handling for R using the Microsoft 365 API. This package is built on top of the Microsoft Azure team's R package [Microsoft365R](https://github.com/Azure/Microsoft365R). 

## Installation

You can install the released version of m365filer via GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("atorus-research/m365filer")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(m365filer)
## basic example code
```
